All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
Class takes input commands from user.
CommonUtil
Common Utility class that checks all null/empty strings, objects and collections.
Continent
Model class that manages all the continents on the provided map.
Country
Model class that manages all the countries on the provided map.
GameConstants
This class is used to initialise all the constants that are going to be used throughout the code base.
GameEngine
This is the entry point for the Game and keeps track of the current Game State.
GameState
Model class to manage the GameState functions
InvalidCommand
This class throws Invalid Command Exceptions
InvalidMap
This class throws Invalid Map Exceptions
Map
Model class to manage the uploaded maps
MapService
The MapService class is used to load, read, parse, edit and the save map file.
MapView
This is MapView class for displaying and accessing maps.
Order
This model class manages the orders given by the players.
Player
This class depicts the player information and services.
PlayerService
This service is used for handle the players.
